fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components

Class DynamicAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components.DynamicAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI

    public class DynamicAssembler
extends AbstractComponent
    The class DynamicAssembler implements a component that creates the other components of the dynamic deployment example, makes them interconnect, and starts them.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : March 14, 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • DynamicAssembler

        public DynamicAssembler(java.lang.String consumerJVMURI,
                        java.lang.String providerJVMURI,
                        java.lang.String consumerOutboundPortURI,
                        java.lang.String providerInboundPortURI)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        create the dynamic assembler component.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        consumerJVMURI - URI of the JVM that will hold the consumer component.
        providerJVMURI - URI of the JVM that will hold the provider component.
        consumerOutboundPortURI - URI of the URI consumer outbound port
        providerInboundPortURI - URI of the URI provider inbound port
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
